hr.fer.zemris.java.hw04.db

Class QueryLexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw04.db.QueryLexer

  • public class QueryLexer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents lexical analyser. It returns conditional expressions from accepted query.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Toni Martinčić
